definition: a very large quantity of something
sentence: The garden was filled with an abundance of colorful flowers.

definition: acting or done quickly and without thought or care
sentence: His impetuous decision to leave college surprised everyone.

definition: very attentive to and concerned about accuracy and detail
sentence: He was fastidious in his work, ensuring everything was perfect.
The population was not homogeneous but a mix of various cultures.

definition: a person or thing regarded as a perfect example of a particular quality
sentence: She is a paragon of virtue, always helping others in need.

definition: the experience of feeling something indirectly through someone else
sentence: Her vicariousness in watching others' adventures brought her joy.
The company has grown into a behemoth in the tech industry.

definition: A person or thing that announces or signals the approach of another.
sentence: The arrival of the first robin is often seen as a harbinger of spring.
They believed it was kismet that brought them together in that caf√©.

definition: A state of feeling, often pleasant, of tiredness or inertia.
sentence: The languor of the summer afternoon made it hard to stay awake.
